summary: macOS is the operating system used on Apple's Mac computers. It was first released in 2001 as Mac OS X and has since become very popular. It's the second most used desktop operating system after Microsoft Windows. macOS is based on an older system called NeXTSTEP and has gone through several changes over the years. It was originally named after big cats and later after places in California. The latest version runs on Apple's own processors, called Apple M series.
title: MacOS
